results.title: Fertility-sparing treatment for atypical endometrial hyperplasia and endometrial cancer.
results.text_hl: AUTHORS' CONCLUSIONS: In light of the low certainty of the evidence, it is unclear which intervention and which route of administration or dose of progestins could be of benefit compared to others for fertility-sparing management of @DISEASE_Endometrial_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D016889 @@@endometrial cancer@@@ or @<m>DISEASE_Endometrial_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004714 @@@AEH@@@. The addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to progestins may increase complete response slightly.

citations.NLM: Fernandez-Montoli ME, Sabadell J, Contreras Perez NA, Verdaguer Menéndez-Arango P, Julia Torres C, Lleberia J. Fertility-sparing treatment for atypical endometrial hyperplasia and endometrial cancer. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2025 Jul 8;7(7):CD013111. PMID: 40626388
citations.BibTeX: @article{40626388, title={Fertility-sparing treatment for atypical endometrial hyperplasia and endometrial cancer.}, author={Fernandez-Montoli ME and Sabadell J and Contreras Perez NA and Verdaguer Menéndez-Arango P and Julia Torres C and Lleberia J}, journal={Cochrane Database Syst Rev}, volume={7}, number={7}, pages={CD013111}}

results.title: A Randomized Clinical Trial of Levonorgestrel Intrauterine System with or without Metformin for Treatment of Endometrial Hyperplasia without Atypia in Indian Women
results.text_hl: In recent years following the case report of use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to treat @<m>DISEASE_Endometrial_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004714 @@@EH@@@ (Session et al., 2003), various trials have come up with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a management option for @<m>DISEASE_Endometrial_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004714 @@@EH@@@.

results.title: The impact of adjunctive metformin to progesterone for the treatment of non-atypical endometrial hyperplasia in a randomized fashion, a placebo-controlled, double blind clinical trial.
results.text_hl: Most recently, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has been suggested as an adjuvant medication for treating of @<m>DISEASE_Endometrial_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004714 @@@EH@@@ with better outcome.
